receivePAMContent

public void receivePAMContent(NodeStructure ns)
Description copied from interface: PAMListener
This method should return as possible in order to no delay the rest of the broadcasting. A good implementation should just store the content in a buffer and return.

Specified by:
receivePAMContent in interface PAMListener

activateCodelets

public void activateCodelets()
Main method of the perceptual buffer. Stores shared content and then sends it to the codelet driver.
